snippet: ZIRINSKY--Daniel Bruce, on March 27, 2016. Beloved husband of Gilda, loving father and stepfather of Steven (Paula), Mark (Adena Sladek), Laura (Jason Liebowitz), Jeff Schiff (Nancy Arcadipone), Kenny Schiff (Jennifer) and Jill Monoson (Seth). Cherished grandfather of Joshua, David, Jackie, Robert, Abby, Harris, Ethan, Madeline, Avery and the late Gabriel. Services Tuesday, March 29, 2016 at 11:15am at Temple Emanuel of Great Neck, 150 Hicks Lane, Great Neck, NY. For information contact Riverside Nassau North Chapels, (516) 487-9600. 1/3

Beloved husband of Gilda, loving father and stepfather of Steven (Paula), Mark (Adena Sladek), Laura (Jason Liebowitz), Jeff Schiff (Nancy Arcadipone), Kenny Schiff (Jennifer) and Jill Monoson (Seth). Cherished grandfather of Joshua, David, Jackie, Robert, Abby, Harris, Ethan, Madeline, Avery and the late Gabriel. Services Tuesday, March 29, 2016 at 11:15am at Temple Emanuel of Great Neck, 150 Hicks Lane, Great Neck, NY. For information contact Riverside Nassau North Chapels, (516) 487-9600. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ZIRINSKY, DANIEL BRUCE
